price: 101. Diggah Nixxigal Nek ruftóo kee maqaané kah warrayte mari, Jannatti mara kinnoonumul, woo mari girák axxeerimeleeh tet maculan.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
